Title: Knight-Draconis
Legend: Only one who has truly bonded with a Draconith can become a Knight-Draconis. Such unity is symbolised by the flaming blades these champions wield, and they eagerly bring burning death to any foe that stands before them.
Intro: A Knight-Draconis is armed with a Aeonfire Blade.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Lords of the Exemplar Chamber • Lords of the Harbinger Chamber • Lords of the Warrior Chamber

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Draconith is armed with a Draconic Flamestream and Draconic Fangs and Talons.

Rules.Name: Arcane Heritage
Rules.Fluff: Whether raised within the temple-vessels of the Seraphon or born in the wilds of the realms, every young Draconith has developed a resistance to the arcane.
Rules.Rule: Each time this unit is affected by a spell or the abilities of an endless spell, you can roll a dice. On a 4+, ignore the effect of that spell or the effects of that endless spell’s abilities on this unit.

Rules.Name: Draconic Flamestream
Rules.Fluff: A Draconith can unleash annihilating streams of wyrmflame with each exhalation.
Rules.Rule: Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with a Draconic Flamestream. Instead, roll a dice. On a 1-2, nothing happens. On a 3-4, the target suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 5-6, the target suffers D6 mortal wounds.

Rules.Name: Wrath Of The Draconith
Rules.Fluff: At their champion’s command, the Stormdrake Guard loose the searing force of their mounts when their foe least expects it.
Rules.Rule: Wrath of the Draconith: Once per battle, in your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly STORMDRAKE GUARD unit wholly within 12" of this unit that has not made a shooting attack in that phase. That unit can shoot.

Rules.Name: Dragged Into The Tempest
Rules.Fluff: Propelling themselves skywards with immense force, a Draconith drags their victims into the clouds to be torn asunder and hurled down onto the battlefield as a grisly ruin.
Rules.Rule: Dragged into the Tempest: In the combat phase, after all of this unit’s attacks have been resolved, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this unit and roll a dice. If the roll is greater than that unit’s Wounds characteristic, your opponent must pick 1 model in that unit. That model is slain.
